summary: The קורסCDO – CDAiO מחזור14 is a comprehensive program designed to train professionals in the roles and responsibilities of Chief Data Officers (CDOs) and Chief Data & AI Officers (CDAiOs). The course is hosted by Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, which serves as a bridge between academia and industry. The program includes 27 professional sessions and 2 enrichment sessions, covering topics such as data strategy, data governance, AI/ML, data monetization, cloud security, and digital transformation. Participants will gain hands-on experience through hybrid learning environments, access to advanced multimedia equipment, and collaboration with industry leaders. The course culminates in a final project and presentation, preparing students for international certifications and career advancement in the data and AI fields.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: קורס CDO – CDAiO מחזור 14

COURSE OVERVIEW: The CDO – CDAiO course is designed to bridge the gap between academia and industry, providing a unique and innovative learning framework. The program aims to equip participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to integrate, advance, and excel in the high-tech and cyber industries. The course includes hybrid learning options, international certifications, and partnerships with leading companies such as EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, and AWS. The program also offers career workshops, personal mentoring, and portfolio building to prepare students for job interviews and career advancement.

TARGET AUDIENCE: Not explicitly mentioned.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Eran Shaham: Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security. Contact: eran.shaham@biu.ac.il, 050-6560666.
- Esther Agayev: Course Coordinator. Contact: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il, 052-5886002.
- Ido Biger: CDAiO Track Leader, EVP, CIO – Delek US, and CEO at DK. Formerly CDO at ELAL Israel Airlines and Head of Data at Yes.
- Lior Israeli: CDAiO Track Leader, Head of Data, AI & Analytics – Circles AI. Formerly Manager of Data & AI Strategy at Deloitte. Contact: lior.israeli@gmail.com, 052-2553468.
- Oren Mizrahi: Lecturer in AI/ML, Data Science & CDO Operational Management. VP, Chief Data & Analytics Officer at Menora Mivtachim. Formerly at City Bank.
- Einat Shimoni: Lecturer in CDO, Data & AI Literacy. EVP Researcher of Technology Trends at STKI.
- Itay Hazan: Lecturer in Data Monetization. CFO at PayBox. Formerly Strategic Director at Oracle and Chief Data & Digital Officer at Cal.
- Alon Schwartz: Lecturer in Digital Transformation and Data. Head of Data, Analytics, and AI at Proceed. Formerly CIO at Irani Corp and Head of Data & Digital at Clalit.
- Oren Harel: Lecturer in Data Governance Technologies. Consultant in Data Management and Governance at Aman. Formerly Manager of Data Governance at Deloitte.
- Tani Shapira: Lecturer, Privacy Protection Expert, and DPO. HIPAA Auditor at MyEDPO. Formerly at Yigal Arnon & Co.
- Hillel Koberovsky: Lecturer in Cyber Security and Career Management. Cyber Security Expert at Fortinet.
- Dor Eliav: Lecturer in Effective Presentations and Public Speaking. Leadership and Personal Empowerment Expert.
- Oren Yeager: Lecturer in Cloud Transformation and Architecture. CISO and Cloud Security Expert.

PREREQUISITES: Not explicitly mentioned.

CERTIFICATIONS: International certifications from EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, AWS.

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: November 4, 2024.
- Duration: 27 professional sessions + 2 enrichment sessions.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays, 17:30–21:30. Additional enrichment sessions on other days as announced.
- Submission Deadline for Final Project: February 4, 2025.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Physical Learning Environment:
  - Classrooms: Buildings 403, 505.
  - Protected Space: Building 404, Floor 1.
  - Coffee Corner: Building 403, Floor 1, near Classroom 68.
  - Cafeteria: Across the path between Buildings 403 and 404.
  - Vending Machines: Entrances to Buildings 404 and 504.
  - Parking: Paid parking available at 20₪ per evening or 300₪ for the course duration. Registration required via the course coordinator.
- Digital Learning Environment:
  - WhatsApp group for the class.
  - Permanent Zoom link.
  - Google Drive with lecture recordings, presentations, and additional materials.
  - Course contact list.
  - Classroom WiFi settings.
  - Alumni group post-course completion.

TUITION AND FEES:
- Parking fees: 20₪ per evening or 300₪ for the course duration.

COURSE TOPICS:
- Data & Insights Driven Organization.
- The CDAiO Roles, Responsibilities, and Agenda Overview.
- Data Strategy Building Process, Management, and Measurement.
- Data Platform & Architecture.
- Cloud Journey and Security.
- Data Strategy in the Cloud.
- Data Privacy & Regulations.
- Organizational Data Governance.
- The Data Analyst.
- Data Visualization & Storytelling.
- Data Science Life Cycle and Machine Learning.
- Data Science Operation Management.
- Data Governance Management Technologies.
- Generative AI Projects.
- Data Monetization.
- Executive Look at Modern Project Management with AI as Co-Pilot.
- Data & AI Literacy.
- CDAiO Final Project & Summary Lecture.
- Career Management & LinkedIn Appearance.
- Building a Winning Presentation & Persuasive Speeches.
- Advanced Project Management Aimed for Data Products.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:
- Course Coordinator: Esther Agayev. Contact: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il, 052-5886002.
- Director: Eran Shaham. Contact: eran.shaham@biu.ac.il, 050-6560666.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION:
- Institution: Bar-Ilan University, School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security.
- Partnerships: EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, AWS.
- Vision: To support high-tech industry professionals throughout their careers with innovative learning solutions and international certifications.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
- Final Project: Students are required to submit a comprehensive project covering all main course topics by February 4, 2025. The project includes a presentation of 5-6 slides, lasting 10-15 minutes, followed by a Q&A session.
- Collaboration: The course collaborates with the MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.
- Certification: Participants will receive a certificate upon successful completion of the course requirements.
